guideline.name: Annotation of FDA Label for oliceridine and CYP2D6

relatedGenes.name: cytochrome P450 family 2 subfamily D member 6

text.html: "In patients who are known or suspected to be poor CYP2D6 metabolizers, based on genotype or previous history/experience with other CYP2D6 substrates, less frequent dosing of OLINVYK [oliceridine] may be required. These patients should be closely monitored, and subsequent doses should be based on the patientâ€™s severity of pain and response to treatment." See label for more information

citations.title: Drugs@FDA: Drug Product OLINVYK (OLICERIDINE), NDA210730, Trevena, Inc.
